This app allows view of a low-latency video stream from a remote camera that automatically tracks an old O-gauge train, which has been hacked to allow remote control. It is recommended to view the camera stream in landscape orientation.

If the video stream becomes laggy or pixelated, please press the Reload button to reset the video stream.

Use the Station... and Track... menus to select the next destination station and the next track, respectively. The track will be switched only when it is safe to do so, which is when the train is in the tunnel or in the forest.

When the train is stopped, you may also look at the different points of interest using the View... menu. To dismiss a menu without making a selection, just tap the menu button again.

When ready, press the Start button below. On iOS devices, to view the video in full-screen mode, you can create a home screen shortcut via Share -> Add to Home Screen once on the camera screen. Have fun!
